name: fso-phonebook-backend
description: FullStackOpen.com exercises - backend for phonebook app

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../full-stack-open/phonebook && npm run build -prod && cp -r build ../FSO-phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: vlxa
